overview: Clifford S. Carthan has an extensive background in general management consulting with expertise in strategic planning and financial management. He brings a wide range of business experience attained over thirty years with international management consulting firms, Fortune 500 companies, and small businesses. His career includes positions at Booz, Allen and Hamilton, Esmark, and Container Corporation of America. He is a graduate of DePaul University and the University of Chicago, Booth Graduate School of Business.
